Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.description: Sign and approve documents through docusign activities (Need docusign account)

Activity.description: activity to execute code snippets in the selected language
Activity.name: Script

inputs.val:
<inputs><script language="1" script="/* Set uploaded File path */
File fileObject = xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_FILE_TO_SIGN};
workflow.setVariable("VAR_FILE_UPLOAD_PATH",fileObject.getAbsolutePath());
logger.info("INFO: File uploaded on server ["+ xpath:{/workflow/system/workflowEngine/clientName} +"] at the location:-> ["+ workflow.getVariable("VAR_FILE_UPLOAD_PATH") +"]");

logger.info("INFO: Setting variable VAR_FILE_UPLOAD_PATH = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_FILE_UPLOAD_PATH") + "]");
/* Set uploaded File name */
workflow.setVariable("VAR_FILE_NAME",fileObject.getName());
logger.info("INFO: Setting variable VAR_FILE_NAME = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_FILE_NAME") + "]");
/* Set Destination directory */
String tmp = xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_FILE_STORE_DIRECTORY} + "\\" + xpath:{/workflow/system/jobId};
workflow.setVariable("VAR_DIR_JOBID",tmp);
logger.info("INFO: Setting variable VAR_DIR_JOBID = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_DIR_JOBID") + "]");
/* Set new file name */
String tmp = "moved_" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_FILE_NAME");
workflow.setVariable("VAR_NEW_FILE_NAME",tmp);
logger.info("INFO: Setting variable VAR_NEW_FILE_NAME = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_NEW_FILE_NAME") + "]");
/* Set Destination path for new file */
String tmp = workflow.getVariable("VAR_DIR_JOBID") + "\\" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_NEW_FILE_NAME");
workflow.setVariable("VAR_MOVED_FILE_PATH",tmp);
logger.info("INFO: Setting variable VAR_MOVED_FILE_PATH = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_MOVED_FILE_PATH") + "]");
/* Set destination path for current file */
String tmp = workflow.getVariable("VAR_DIR_JOBID") + "\\" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_FILE_NAME");
workflow.setVariable("VAR_DEST_FILE_PATH",tmp);
logger.info("INFO: Setting variable VAR_DEST_FILE_PATH = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_DEST_FILE_PATH") + "]");" /></inputs>

Activity.description: executes a defined process block within the workflow
Activity.name: ExecuteProcessBlock

Activity.name: OnWorkflowComplete

Activity.name: WorkflowEnd

inputs.val:
<inputs><script language="1" script="logger.info("INFO: pb_status : [" + xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_6/pb_status} + "]");
logger.info("INFO: _singed file status : [" + xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_SIGNED_FILE_RECEIVED} + "]");

if (!xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_6/pb_status}.equals("COMPLETED") || !xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_SIGNED_FILE_RECEIVED}.equals("yes"))
{
 workflow.setVariable("VAR_WF_STATUS", "FAILED");
 workflow.setVariable("VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE", xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_6/pb_failiure_message});
 logger.info("INFO: Setting VAR_WF_STATUS = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_WF_STATUS") + "]");
 logger.info("INFO: Setting VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE") + "]");
}" /></inputs>

Activity.description: activity to execute code snippets in the selected language
Activity.name: Script

inputs.val:
<inputs><script language="1" script="logger.info("INFO: Checking _signed file at [" + xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_DIR_JOBID} + "]");
File folder = new File(xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_DIR_JOBID});
File[] listOfFiles = folder.listFiles();
String strToCheck = "_signed";
String signedFilePresent = "no";

for (int i = 0; i < listOfFiles.length; i++)
{
 if (listOfFiles[i].isFile())
 {
 String file1name = listOfFiles[i].getName();
 if (file1name.toLowerCase().contains(strToCheck.toLowerCase()))
 {
 signedFilePresent = "yes";
 }
 }
}

workflow.setVariable("VAR_SIGNED_FILE_RECEIVED",signedFilePresent);
logger.info("INFO : VAR_SIGNED_FILE_RECEIVED [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_SIGNED_FILE_RECEIVED") + "]");" /></inputs>

Activity.description: executes a defined process block within the workflow
Activity.name: ExecuteProcessBlock
